Actions.ActionName: If the menu item isn't available, exit

ThenActions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
ThenActions.Prompt: You have to be editing a macro.

Actions.ActionName: Find out if the Insert Action by Name window is open, into 'Local_WindowIsOpen'
Actions.Text:
tell application "System Events"
   tell application process "Keyboard Maestro"
      exists of window "Insert Action By Name"
  end tell
end tell

ElseActions.ActionName: Open 'Insert Action by Name', and add "FAV ' to the search box
